title: Honor Level 0
body: So, I got temp banned for 2 weeks and it dropped my honor level to 0. How long does it actually take to get back to mastery 1 or 2? I've had over like 50 games since I last got temp banned and it seems to be taking forever. Am I just stuck with honor 0 for the rest of my time on League? If so, whats the point of the mastery system? Why is there no progression bar or anything?

replies.body:
"We don't have a timer or visible meter to track leveling honor." Translation: We don't know. We don't care. 

"Your best bet is to continue playing consistently without behavioral occurrences, and you'll get back up regardless of receiving an honor or not for the match."

We'll level you up when we feel like it even though we have no clear idea of how well your honor has scaled because we don't keep track of this shit.  Stop being a little kid and we'll think about it, maybe.





I've been waiting 2 months+ for mine to change in one direction. I forgot it even existed.

We don't have a timer or visible meter to track leveling honor.  Your best bet is to continue playing consistently without behavioral occurrences, and you'll get back up regardless of receiving an honor or not for the match.  Hang in there!
I have waited for like 1 month already. No progress. Is there really a way to lvl back up?
I am waitin like 3 months now without any ounishments or beeing banned and still no lvl 1 from 0...

Yea the honor system is busted. Got a two week ban for calling someone a word they considered homophobic, never had any issues before. Honor at 0 and haven't progressed even when I've been honored by my teammates beyond count and numberless games, they honestly dont care.
It is simply impossible for me to get keys to open chest at this point. I have 5-6 chest with 2 shards. RIOT. At least give us a meter of some sorts. Will u at least have on in the future?
yay i got banned for 2 week for saying the word "GARBO". that was in september... and im still on honour 0
